description: This Python source file sets up an agent with knowledge base capabilities, including initializing a URL knowledge object, configuring a vector database, and running asynchronous methods to load knowledge and generate responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of performing tasks with a knowledge base.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Handles URL-based knowledge and search functionalities.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model interface for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search types in the vector database.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate it.

methods.name: aprinResponse
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a response based on the knowledge base and input query.
